author: @spgambler
title: Hibernian vs Motherwell Prediction, Lineups & Odds
text:
Hibernian vs Motherwell Prediction, Lineups & Odds
Hibs Might Prove Too Strong
Hibernian look a great bet to beat Motherwell on the Full-Time Result market. You can get odds of 1.65 that the home team claim a victory and this looks like a value wager based on the latest stats and team news.
Hibs Too Good for Motherwell in Last H2H
Hibernian played Rangers at home in their last game. It was a 3-3 draw at Easter Road Stadium. The Edinburgh side enjoyed just 38% possession and had six shots on target, while Martin Boyle bagged two goals and Rocky Bushiri scored the other.
Motherwell drew on their travels in their previous game. A 0-0 scoreline was played out against Kilmarnock at The BBSP Stadium, Rugby Park. The Well were restricted to just 31% possession and had two shots on goal.
It was Hibs who were victorious when they last faced Motherwell. At Fir Park, a 3-0 away victory was recorded. We’ve seen the previous 10 H2H meetings include five Hibs triumphs, two draws and three Motherwell wins.
Scottish Premiership | G | W | D | L | GF | GA | GD | GD | P | |
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
5 | Motherwell | 22 | 9 | 4 | 9 | 27 | 34 | -7 | 27:34 | 31 |
8 | Hibernian | 22 | 6 | 8 | 8 | 31 | 35 | -4 | 31:35 | 26 |
[View Full Table](#table)
5 wins, 2 losses and 3 draws, averaging 2.0 goals from 11.1 attempts and 5.2 shots on goal. Hibs have had 44.0% possession and 6.5 corners per match. On average, they have conceded 1.7 goals from 9.2 attempts and 4.8 shots on goal, while their opponents have earned 7.9 corners.
Martin Boyle, Dwight Gayle and Nicky Cadden are the leading goalscorers with 3, while Rocky Bushiri has 2. Nicky Cadden has recorded the most assists with 3.
Motherwell – Last 10 League GamesMotherwell have 3 victories, 4 defeats and 3 draws, averaging 6.7 attempts, 3.2 shots on goal and 1.1 goals. The Well average 36.7% possession, 3.4 corners awarded and 7.3 corners against them, while 1.8 goals have been conceded from 5.9 shots on goal and 11.4 attempts.
Apostolos Stamatelopoulos is the leading scorer with 4 goals, followed by Tawanda Maswanhise on 2, with Ewan Wilson and two others bagging 1. Tawanda Maswanhise and Lennon Miller have been the top assists providers with 2 in the last 10 games.
Predicted & Confirmed Lineups
Hibernian (predicted lineup): Jordan Smith, Lewis Miller, Rocky Bushiri, Jack Iredale, Chris Cadden, Nectarios Triantis, Hyeok-kyu Kwon, Nicky Cadden, Martin Boyle, Josh Campbell, Dwight Gayle.
Motherwell (predicted lineup): Aston Oxborough, Kofi Balmer, Dan Casey, Liam Gordon, Marvin Kaleta, Andrew Halliday, Davor Zdravkovski, Ewan Wilson, Jack Vale, Tawanda Maswanhise, Tony Watt.
Expert Scottish Premiership Analysis
The football experts at Sportsgambler.com always keep close tabs on team news. We also use a form guide for our betting tips along with checking out the stats that are going to help inform our final decision.
Key Hibernian vs Motherwell league stats:
Hibernian vs Motherwell Prediction
Hibernian look like the real deal to claim a victory, especially as odds of 1.65 are available. You can back this value selection with confidence when they line up in this Scottish Premiership clash.
As an alternative, you could consider the Asian Handicap where you can back Hibs to cover a particular line. That means you might need a margin of victory to yield a return.
Hibs to Win Probability
The betting sites make it a 60.6% chance that our pick is settled as a winner. After careful examination, our tipsters calculate this probability to be somewhere between 65-70%. It is therefore regarded as a value bet.
Our Pick
[Hibs To Win @ 1.65](/betting-sites/go/bet365/sport?utm_campaign=sgc)
Correct Score Prediction
An exciting bet could be a 3-1 victory in favor of Hibernian at odds of 12.00. A correct score wager provides a fun alternative and a nice potential return on the cards.
Corners Prediction
In eight consecutive games, Motherwell have fallen short of 4.5 corners. The Motherwell Team Corners tally could be lower than the line implies and that leads us to a wager at odds of 1.64.

Hibernian vs Motherwell Odds
Hibernian are the shortest price to win this Scottish Premiership game according to the bookies, with the gambling operators giving them a 61% probability due to their 1.65 betting odds. Motherwell are regarded as the least likely winner at 5.00.
It’s hard to split the odds between Over 2.5 Goals and Under 2.5 Goals for this match. When it comes to Both Teams to Score, it’s anyone’s guess as to whether Yes or No will pay out on this market.
Head over to the Bet Builder and you’ll find all the popular football betting site markets available. Scottish Premiership selections can then be combined together in a same-game accumulator which you can cheer on.
